description:
usr/pkg: (various) corrections regarding the location of packages.

I hope I got these right.  I'm not sure I understand why the
builds haven't already picked them up, but I thought I'd submit
these on the off chance that there is something to it.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com, rsc@golang.org),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=5ee895241fd3 ***

html/template, net/http, websocket: fix import paths in comments

R=golang-dev
CC=golang-dev, rsc
http://codereview.appspot.com/5411048

Committer: Russ Cox <rsc@golang.org>
